programme.title: Labor Day
programme.desc: In the summer of 1987, over the Labor Day weekend, a mother (Kate Winslet) and her child offer a wounded man a lift. As the police searches the town for the convict, the mother and her son eventually know the truth behind him, and their chances gradually decrease.

programme.title: Shall We Dance
programme.desc: John Clark is a successful lawyer, a happy husband, and a father. When he returns home every day, he notices from the train window a dancing school, and sees Paulina standing stray watching the horizon sadly. He signs up for dancing lessons, only to discover that dancing is his great passion.

programme.title: Tad the Lost Explorer and the Secret of King Midas
programme.desc: When his girlfriend Sara is kidnapped, the awkward explorer Tad Jones must embark on a journey to save her. But unbeknownst to him, he gets into unimaginable trouble as it turns out Sara's kidnapper is a millionaire who is after the necklace of King Midas.

programme.title: Dora and the Lost City of Gold
programme.desc: Dora who spent her life exploring jungles with her parents,is facing a new challenge--high school. Along with a group of teens and Boots the monkey,she embarks on an adventure to rescue her parents while trying to unlock the mystery of a lost Incan civilization.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: A couple chooses to adopt three foster children to begin a family. As they attempt to care for a traumatized adolescent and her two younger siblings, mayhem breaks out.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Sam's intention to leave the Autobots behind in pursuit of a normal life is thwarted as an old Decepticon known as The Fallen rises, forcing Sam and his girlfriend Mikaela to delve into the history of the Transformers on Earth to find a way to defeat The Fallen.

programme.title: Morning Glory
programme.desc: An out of work TV producer,is brought in to manage the "Daybreak" program ,only to discover that it will be cancelled by the end of the year and she was brought to manage it for the remaining months only, but she decides to bring it back to life with the help of the channel's best hosts.

programme.title: The Witches

programme.title: Taj

programme.title: Khoyout Al Ma'azeeb
programme.desc: Farhan is forced by life to work for a cruel man, Abu Issa. Farhan finds himself obligated to do everything Abu Issa orders until he has the opportunity to confront his oppression and injustice, leave everything, and run far away.

programme.title: El Atawla
programme.desc: A bloody conflict arises between two brothers due to greed and jealousy, and revenge fills their hearts, causing the destruction of the entire family and putting one of them in prison.

programme.title: Zawja Wahida La Takfi
programme.desc: Rasheed, his wife, Haila, and their three daughters live an ideal life, running a co-ed school. However, with the passage of time, secrets about Rasheed are revealed that no one expected.

programme.title: Jak El Elm
programme.desc: Abu Samel returns with his wife Umm Samel again, and many situations and paradoxes occur between them, where Umm Samel tries to be in control and forcefully impose her opinion.

programme.title: Sikket Safar 3
programme.desc: In this season, the three brothers, Khaled, Nasser, and Walid, join forces, after one of them is falsely accused of committing a crime. However, they decide to travel far away to hide in a safe city, unaware that the real criminal has been arrested.

programme.desc: In the second season, Ferit is urgently brought to Istanbul after he was shot, and Seyran remains by his side, as the surgery he will undergo is fraught with risks. Hatice meets with Saffet Aga and Halis Aga to prevent further chaos and the closure of Saffet Aga's case.

programme.title: Dirty Laundry
programme.desc: The lives of the wealthiest and most influential families in Istanbul, and their maids frequently become a part of their stories after being exposed to the mysteries, secrets, and murders kept behind closed doors.

programme.desc: The events revolve around Mariam, a woman who is forced by circumstances to abandon her daughter, Tamara, as a child, so the latter grows cold toward her. Mariam is also being deceived by her psychiatrist and her husband, Youssef.
